info.title: DelyvaX SaaS
info.description: DelyvaX technology is a comprehensive Software-as-a-service (SaaS) solution, providing end-to-end experiences from order to delivery.

bearerAuth.description: You can obtain API Key in Customer Portal. Go to 'Settings' > 'API Integrations' > 'Add new key'.

process.description: false=save order as draft (default), true=process order

scheduledAt.description: ISO8601 Date or "now", Expected date and time at waypoint.

type.description: Item type, eg: PARCEL, FOOD, from instant quote

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description:
There's two type of authentication you can use. You can choose which one is suitable to your needs.
1. API Key
2. JWT Token

tags.name: Authentication > API Key
tags.description:
1. You can obtain API Key in Customer Portal.
Go to "Settings" > "API Integrations" > "Add new key".
2. **OR** You can also generating it programmatically using [Create API Key/Token](#460d0f77-7a2b-45c9-bb11-a2962ab8aa9f) API.


To authenticate, send `X-Delyvax-Access-Token: <access_token>` header, where `<access_token>` is replaced with the api key.

tags.name: Authentication > JWT Token
tags.description:
1. Use **Login User** api to get the jwt token
2. Please cache the token, and AVOID calling login user api each time.
3. JWT token will expire in a very short time, you need to renew the token when it's expire or when nearly expire.


To authenticate you should supply the JWT token in the Authorization HTTP header with the Bearer schema as follows:

```
Authorization: Bearer <jwt_token>
```

You need to obtain new token once it expires, please only request new token when the token nearly expire or when it expire.

tags.name: Create Order
tags.description:
Order status code

| Status code | Description |
| ----- | ----- |
| 0 | Draft |
| 10 | Payment pendin / processing |
| 11 | Unpaid order / Abandoned |
| 99 | Create order failed |
| 100 | Order created |
| 110 | Order ready (Label printed) |
| 200 | Pending for collection / Assigned to driver |
| 400 | Pickup start |
| 450 | Arrived for pick-up |
| 475 | Pick-up failed |
| 500 | Pickup success / Collected (by courier) |
| 501 | On-hold |
| 555 | Hub check-in |
| 556 | Hub check-out |
| 600 | Delivery start |
| 625 | Arrived for deliver |
| 650 | Failed to deliver |
| 661 | Returning to sender |
| 663 | Failed to return
| 700 | Item Delivered / Collected (by recipient) |
| 701 | Item Returned |
| 654 | Failed - Driver cancel |
| 655 | Failed (generic/reason) |
| 900 | Order Cancelled |
| 1000 | Order completed |

post.description: Instant quote works with minimal data, send more data to get more accurate pricing.
Allow you to create an order
This will cancel the order, and set order status code to 900.

Use this API to processed draft order (order with statusCode 0).
You can also use this to retry failed order (order with statusCode 99)

`resultType=latestFirst` will return last status, old status is returned in `histories` attribute.

Authentication is not required, but **companyId** is required. However companyId is **optional** if Bearer token is present.


This type of tracking will also return estimated time arrival when order is in statusCode **400** (in transit to pickup) or **600** (in transit for dropoff).

If not applicable, `arrival` attribute will return as `null`.

If estimation can't be calculated, distance and/or duration value will returned as `-1`
